I found the error. In the “stuff” command I posted, I added an extra "+. Had nothing to do with { or }s. Oh well, thanks.

item.title: 100 Error Question. Huge Chuck 'o Code Included
item.dc:creator: @slomifier slomifier
item.description:
@slomifier wrote:

What’d you change?

I got 100 errors. God this is annoying. I SEE NOTHING WRONG!

I cleared the first chunk of code, its in the second one.

Found A problem. The error isn’t in any of the code I posted. Now I don’t know where it is. Must’ve accidently hit backspace while I was scrolling.

Found where it is:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“fights”)) {
if (playerRights < 2){
teleportToX = 2965;
teleportToY = 3352;
heightLevel = 0;
sendMessage(“Welcome!”);
sendMessage(“BE CAREFUL!”);
Teleblock();
}else{
teleportToX = 2964;
teleportToY = 3348;
heightLevel = 0;
sendMessage(“Welcome!”);
sendMessage(“Be Careful If You Wish.”);
}
}

if (command.startsWith(“dfights”)) {
if (playerRights < 2){
teleportToX = 3334;
teleportToY = 3213;
heightLevel = 0;
sendMessage(“Welcome!”);
sendMessage(“BE CAREFUL!”);
Teleblock();
}else{
teleportToX = 3330;
teleportToY = 3213;
heightLevel = 0;
sendMessage(“Welcome!”);
sendMessage(“Be Careful If You Wish.”);
}
}

if (command.startsWith(“vfights”)) {
teleportToX = 3215;
teleportToY = 3476;
}

if (command.startsWith(“stuff”)) {
sendMessage("MP = "+MP);
sendMessage("PosUd = "+posupdate);
sendMessage("Chamber = "+chamber);
sendMessage("Camt = "+camt);
sendMessage("Miki = "+minikill);
sendMessage("Vartt = "+varrtt);
sendMessage("Vart = "+varrt);
sendMessage("Locks = “+lock1+” “+lock2+” “+lock3+” “+lock4+”);
}

if (command.startsWith(“camt”)) {
camt -= 5;
sendMessage("Camt = "+camt);
}

if (command.startsWith(“mikion”)) {
fallyt = true;
fallym = true;
sendMessage("Miki Is "+fallyt);
}

if (command.startsWith(“mikioff”)) {
fallyt = false;
fallym = false;
sendMessage("Miki Is "+fallyt);
}[/code]

Somewhere in there.

Lolz, I found it. In the “stuff” command, beside “Locks =” I needed to get rid of the last +" lol. Thanks to anyone that helped.

Read full topic
item.source: 100 Error Question. Huge Chuck 'o Code Included

item.title: 100 Error Question. Huge Chuck 'o Code Included
item.dc:creator: @WRX WRX`
item.description:
@WRX wrote:

~BACKUP~

Replace the first chunk with this…
Same but i edited to try and fix…

for (int i = 3353; i < 3363; i++){
if ((absX == 2964 || absX == 2965) && (absY == i)){
attforob(mkhgfx, 75, 1, sx1, sy1);
attforob(mkhgfx, 75, 1, sx2, sy1);
stillgfx(mkgfx, sy1, sx1);
stillgfx(mkgfx, sy1, sx2);
}
if((absX == sx1 || absX == sx2) && (absY == sy1)){
setAnimation(1125);
}
}



for (int x = 2961; x < 2966; x++){
if(absX == x && absY == 3347){
fallyt = true;
}
}

if(fallyt == true){
for (int x = 2961; x < 2967; x++){
attforob(492, 999, 1, x, 3349);
stillgfx(197, 3349, x);
attforob(492, 999, 0, x, 3349);
stillgfx(78, 3348, x);
fallym = true;
}
}

if ((absY >= 3330) && (absY <= 3348) && (absX >= 2961) && (absX <= 2980)) {
} else {
fallyt = false;
fallym = false;
summoncount = 0;
}

if(fallym == true && summoncount == 0) {
server.npcHandler.newNPC(2745, 2975, 3342, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1000, false);
summoncount += 1;
Teleblock();
}

if ((absY >= 9310) && (absY <= 9320) && (absX >= 3227) && (absX <= 3239)) {
chamber = true;
}



if(camt <= 0){
for (int x = 3227; x < 3239; x++){
for (int y = 9310; y < 9320; y++){
attforob(379, 35, 0, x, y);
stillgfx(381, y, x);
}
}
}




if ((absY >= 3477) && (absY <= 3486) && (absX >= 3208) && (absX <= 3217)){
 varrt = true;
}

if(varrt == true && varrtt <= 0) {

int tree = misc.random(6);
switch(tree){

case 0:
for (int y = 3482; y < 3486; y++){
attforob(treeg, 45, 1, 3212, y);
stillgfx(treeg, y, 3212);
}
break;

case 1:
for (int y = 3477; y < 3482; y++){ 
attforob(treeg, 45, 1, 3212, y);
stillgfx(treeg, y, 3212);
}
break;

case 2:
for (int x = 3208; x < 3212; x++){ 
attforob(treeg, 45, 1, x, 3482);
stillgfx(treeg, 3482, x);
}
break;

case 3:
for (int x = 3212; x < 3217; x++){ 
attforob(treeg, 45, 1, x, 3482);
stillgfx(treeg, 3482, x);
}
break;

case 4:
break;

case 5:
break;

case 6:
ReplaceObject(3208, 3479, 4871, -1);
break;
}

}






//BR, TL, BL, TR

if ((digging == true) && (absY >= 3278) && (absY <= 3348) && (absX >= 3571) && (absX <= 3579)){
teleportToX = 3557;
teleportToY = 9703;
heightLevel = 3;
}


if((digging == true) && (absX == 3255) && (absY == 3425)){
stillgfx(370, absY, absX);
sendMessage("A Strange Magic Envelops You!");
teleportToX = 3565;
teleportToY = 3289;
sendMessage("Your Here Now. BE CAREFUL!");
}


if((absX == 3253) && (absY == 3422 || absX == 3254) && (absY == 3422) && (rndatt == false)){ 
banktele = true;
selectoption("Do You Want To Cross Over? You Can't Get Back!","Yes", "no", "");
}

if((absX == 3253) && (absY == 3424 || absX == 3254) && (absY == 3424)){ 
closeInterface();
}

if((absX == 3253) && (absY == 3421 || absX == 3254) && (absY == 3421)){ 
closeInterface();
}

if (posupdate <= 0){
if(playerRights >= 2){
posupdate = 45;
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
}else if(playerRights == 1){
posupdate = 60;
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
}else if(playerRights == 0){
posupdate = 75;
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
}
}

If it doesn’t work, delete the folder and rename your backup
Post back to tell me result.

item.title: 100 Error Question. Huge Chuck 'o Code Included
item.dc:creator: @slomifier slomifier
item.description:
@slomifier wrote:

Is there a way to increase the max error meesages shown in the compiler? Mines set to 100, and I need it to show them all. Is there a way to do this?

EDIT: Here all the stuff I changed recently before my last compilation:

for (int i = 3353; i < 3363; i++){
if ((absX == 2964 || absX == 2965) && (absY == i)){
attforob(mkhgfx, 75, 1, sx1, sy1);
attforob(mkhgfx, 75, 1, sx2, sy1);
stillgfx(mkgfx, sy1, sx1);
stillgfx(mkgfx, sy1, sx2);
if((absX == sx1 || absX == sx2) && absY == sy1){
setAnimation(1125);
}
}
}



for (int x = 2961; x < 2966; x++){
if(absX == x && absY == 3347){
fallyt = true;
}
}

if(fallyt == true){
for (int x = 2961; x < 2967; x++){
attforob(492, 999, 1, x, 3349);
stillgfx(197, 3349, x);
attforob(492, 999, 0, x, 3349);
stillgfx(78, 3348, x);
fallym = true;
}
}

if (absY >= 3330 && absY <= 3348 && absX >= 2961 && absX <= 2980){
}else{
fallyt = false;
fallym = false;
summoncount = 0;
}

if(fallym == true && summoncount == 0){
server.npcHandler.newNPC(2745, 2975, 3342, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1000, false);
summoncount += 1;
Teleblock();
}

if (absY >= 9310 && absY <= 9320 && absX >= 3227 && absX <= 3239){
chamber = true;
}



if(camt <= 0){
for (int x = 3227; x < 3239; x++){
for (int y = 9310; y < 9320; y++){
attforob(379, 35, 0, x, y);
stillgfx(381, y, x);
}
}
}




if (absY >= 3477 && absY <= 3486 && absX >= 3208 && absX <= 3217){
 varrt = true;
}

if(varrt == true && varrtt <= 0){

int tree = misc.random(6);
switch(tree){

case 0:
for (int y = 3482; y < 3486; y++){
attforob(treeg, 45, 1, 3212, y);
stillgfx(treeg, y, 3212);
}
break;

case 1:
for (int y = 3477; y < 3482; y++){ 
attforob(treeg, 45, 1, 3212, y);
stillgfx(treeg, y, 3212);
}
break;

case 2:
for (int x = 3208; x < 3212; x++){ 
attforob(treeg, 45, 1, x, 3482);
stillgfx(treeg, 3482, x);
}
break;

case 3:
for (int x = 3212; x < 3217; x++){ 
attforob(treeg, 45, 1, x, 3482);
stillgfx(treeg, 3482, x);
}
break;

case 4:
break;

case 5:
break;

case 6:
ReplaceObject(3208, 3479, 4871, -1);
break;
}
}






//BR, TL, BL, TR

if(digging == true && (absY >= 3278 && absY <= 3348 && absX >= 3571 && absX <= 3579)){
teleportToX = 3557;
teleportToY = 9703;
heightLevel = 3;
}


if(digging == true && (absX == 3255 && absY == 3425)){
stillgfx(370, absY, absX);
sendMessage("A Strange Magic Envelops You!");
teleportToX = 3565;
teleportToY = 3289;
sendMessage("Your Here Now. BE CAREFUL!");
}


if((absX == 3253 && absY == 3422) || (absX == 3254 && absY == 3422) && rndatt == false){ 
banktele = true;
selectoption("Do You Want To Cross Over? You Can't Get Back!","Yes", "no", "");
}

if((absX == 3253 && absY == 3424) || (absX == 3254 && absY == 3424)){ 
closeInterface();
}

if((absX == 3253 && absY == 3421) || (absX == 3254 && absY == 3421)){ 
closeInterface();
}

if (posupdate <= 0){
if(playerRights >= 2){
posupdate = 45;
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
}else if(playerRights == 1){
posupdate = 60;
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
}else if(playerRights == 0){
posupdate = 75;
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
}
}[/code]

and

[code]case 409: // pray alter
case 6552:
int prayed = misc.random(5);
if(prayed <= 2){
sendMessage("You Pray, But There Is No Response");
AddGlobalObj(3243, 9313, 4951, 0, 10);
AddGlobalObj(3236, 9303, 4951, 0, 10);
}else{
hitDiff = -135;
updateRequired = true;
hitUpdateRequired = true;
AddGlobalObj(3243, 9313, 4951, 0, 10);
AddGlobalObj(3236, 9303, 4951, 0, 10);
}
break;

case 6515:
stillgfx(540, absY, absX);
teleportToX = 3242;
teleportToY = 9312;
sendMessage("You Open The Sacrophagus and Walk Inside");
sendMessage("And Appear On The Other Side Of The Wall!");
AddGlobalObj(3243, 9313, 4951, 0, 10);
AddGlobalObj(3243, 9313, 4951, 0, 10);
break;

case 6517:
stillgfx(540, absY, absX);
teleportToX = 3237;
teleportToY = 9306;
sendMessage("You Open The Sacrophagus and Walk Inside");
sendMessage("And Appear On The Other Side Of The Wall!");
AddGlobalObj(3236, 9303, 4951, 0, 10);
AddGlobalObj(3236, 9303, 4951, 0, 10);
break;

case 6514:
stillgfx(196, absY, absX);
sendMessage("A Swarm Of Scarabs Falls Out Of The Sacrophagus!");
hitDiff = 30;
updateRequired = true;
hitUpdateRequired = true;
sendMessage("It Attacks And Flees");
sendMessage("Keep Looking!");
AddGlobalObj(3243, 9313, 4951, 0, 10);
AddGlobalObj(3236, 9303, 4951, 0, 10);
break;

case 4951: //Tele-Able Lever
stillgfx(383, absY, absX);
sendMessage("Your Teleblock Was Lifted!");
teleblock = false;
sendMessage("You May Go Now!");
break;

case 4952: //Lever 1
sendMessage("Lock 1: Disengaged");
lock1 = false;
break;

case 4953: //Lever 2
sendMessage("Lock 2: Disengaged");
lock2 = false;
break;

case 4954: //Lever 3
sendMessage("Lock 3: Disengaged");
lock3 = false;
break;

case 4955: //Lever 4
sendMessage("Lock 4: Disengaged");
lock4 = false;
break;

case 4871:
stillgfx(383, 3477, 3212);
stillgfx(383, 3482, 3208);
stillgfx(383, 3486, 3212);
stillgfx(383, 3482, 3217);
sendMessage("You Operate The Strange Machine");
AddGlobalObj(3212, 3477, 4952, 0, 10);
AddGlobalObj(3208, 3482, 4953, -1, 10);
AddGlobalObj(3212, 3486, 4954, 0, 10);
AddGlobalObj(3217, 3482, 4955, -1, 10);
sendMessage("And Four Levers Pop Out Of The Ground!");
break;[/code]

and the 100 errors:

[code]client.java:12754: not a statement
public boolean pickUpItem(int item, int amount){
                                        ^
client.java:12754: ';' expected
public boolean pickUpItem(int item, int amount){
                                              ^
client.java:12842: illegal start of expression
        public void openUpBank() {
        ^
client.java:12842: illegal start of expression
        public void openUpBank() {
               ^
client.java:12842: ';' expected
        public void openUpBank() {
                              ^
client.java:12848: illegal start of expression
        public void openUpShop(int ShopID) {
        ^
client.java:12848: illegal start of expression
        public void openUpShop(int ShopID) {
               ^
client.java:12848: ';' expected
        public void openUpShop(int ShopID) {
                              ^
client.java:12848: ';' expected
        public void openUpShop(int ShopID) {
                                         ^
client.java:12857: illegal start of expression
        public void openUpPinSettings() {
        ^
client.java:12857: illegal start of expression
        public void openUpPinSettings() {
               ^
client.java:12857: ';' expected
        public void openUpPinSettings() {
                                     ^
client.java:12879: illegal start of expression
        public boolean addItem(int item, int amount) {
        ^
client.java:12879: ';' expected
        public boolean addItem(int item, int amount) {
                              ^
client.java:12879: <identifier> expected
        public boolean addItem(int item, int amount) {
                                        ^
client.java:12879: not a statement
        public boolean addItem(int item, int amount) {
                                             ^
100 errors

Read full topic
